title: Housing Development Adjacent to Transit Stations
summary: Enhanced development allowances for housing near transit stations

overrides.description: Within 0.5 miles of transit stations, municipalities cannot limit density below 50 units/acre
Within 0.5 miles of transit stations, municipalities cannot limit height below 65 feet
Within 0.25 miles of transit stations, parking requirement capped at 0.5 spaces per unit

definitions.transit_station: A station on a fixed rail line or a bus rapid transit (BRT) station with headways of 15 minutes or less during peak hours

notes: This bill creates transit-oriented development (TOD) overlays with enhanced development allowances. Conditions are based on proximity to qualifying transit stations.
